abilities.name: Force Jump
abilities.effect: Each character in this Unit may jump.

abilities.name: I'm Going to End This
abilities.effect: After this Unit makes a combat action, it may use this abiity. One character in this Unit may make an attack targeting one of the same enemy characters within range and LOS.

abilities.name: Deflect
abilities.effect: After a ranged attack targeting a character in this Unit is resolved, this Unit may use this ability. If the attack roll contained one or more failure results, the attacking Unit suffers 2 damage.

abilities.name: This is Where the Fun Begins
abilities.effect: When a character in this Unit Wounds an enemy Primary Unit or enemy Secondary Unit, after the effect is resolved, move the Struggle token one space toward your momentum tokens. Then, if the Wounded Unit is a Primary Unit, each allied Galactic Republic character may heal.

abilities.name: Get a Move On, Soldier
abilities.effect: At the start of this Unit's activation, choose a character in this Unit or another allied Galactic Republic character. The chosen character may dash and may gain hunker.

abilities.name: Defensive Maneuver
abilities.effect: Each character in this Unit may dash. If any characters dash, this Unit gains hunker.

abilities.name: I'm Always First, Kid
abilities.effect: If this Unit is not Wounded, after an allied Clone Trooper Supporting Unit within range 3 of this Unit makes a combat action, this Unit may use this ability. One character in this Unit may dash. If it does, it may make a 5 dice melee or ranged attack targeting one of the same enemy characters within range and LOS.

abilities.name: Bring It On, Clankers
abilities.effect: After an allied Clone Trooper Unit within range 3 of this Unit gains hunker, one character in that Unit may heal.

abilities.name: Brothers in Arms
abilities.effect: While this Unit has one or more hunkers, characters in this Unit have Steadfast.

abilities.name: Defensive Maneuver
abilities.effect: Each character in this Unit may dash. If any characters dash, this Unit gains hunker.

abilities.name: Coordinated Fire: Strain
abilities.effect: When a character in another allied Galactic Republic Unit makes an attack as part of a combat action, before dice are rolled, this Unit may use this ability. If the targeted character is within range 5 of a character in this Unit, the target Unit gains Strain.

abilities.name: Brothers in Arms
abilities.effect: While this Unit has one or more hunkers, characters in this Unit have Steadfast.

abilities.name: Force Speed
abilities.effect: Each character in this Unit may advance.

abilities.name: What's the Matter, To Fast for You?
abilities.effect: When a character in this Unit would suffer damage from a melee attack, this unit may use this ability. This Unit suffers half the damage in the Damage Pool. The attacking Unit suffers the remaining damage.

abilities.name: Deflect
abilities.effect: After a ranged attack targeting a character in this Unit is resolved, this Unit may use this ability. If the attack roll contained one or more failure results, the attacking Unit suffers 2 damage.

abilities.name: Fierce Protector
abilities.effect: When an enemy character Wounds another allied Unit, after the effect is resolved, one character in this Unit may advance toward the enemy character that caused the effect. Then, the character that moved may heal 3 or, if that character is Engaged with the enemy character, it may make a 5 dice melee attack targeting that enemy character.

abilities.name: Pride of the Mandalore
abilities.effect: At the start of this Unit's activation, choose another allied Mandalorian character. The chosen character may jump.

abilities.name: Jet Pack
abilities.effect: Each character in this Unit may jump.

abilities.name: Mandalorians are Stronger Together
abilities.effect: After this Unit makes a move action, it may use this ability. If a character in this Unit is within range 2 of another allied Mandalorian character, this Unit immediately makes a focus action.

abilities.name: Mandalore Will Survive
abilities.effect: After this Unit makes a focus action, one character in this Unit may dash and heal 2.

abilities.name: Some of Us Serve a Higher Purpose
abilities.effect: Allied Mandalorian characters within range 3 of this Unit that are contesting one or more Active objectives have Protection and Steadfast.

abilities.name: Jet Pack
abilities.effect: Each character in this Unit may jump.

abilities.name: Mandalorians are Stronger Together
abilities.effect: After this Unit makes a move action, it may use this ability. If a character in this Unit is within range 2 of another allied Mandalorian character, this Unit immediately makes a focus action.

abilities.name: Helmet Visor
abilities.effect: Characters in this Unit have Sharpshooter[1].

abilities.name: Hello There!
abilities.effect: One character in this Unit may jump. If it does, that character adds 3 dice to its next attack roll during this activation.

abilities.name: So Uncivilized....
abilities.effect: When a character in this Unit is targeted by a ranged attack, this Unit may use this ability. This Unit gains hunker. After the attack is resolved, if the attack roll contained one or more failure results, the attacking Unit suffers 3 damage.

abilities.name: Patience
abilities.effect: When you reveal this Unit's order card, if you have an Order Card in reserve, you may put that card on the top or bottom of your order deck. If you do, put this Unit's Order Card in reserve. When this Unit's Order Card is put in reserve, one character in this Unit may heal 3 and jump.

abilities.name: Knowledge and Defense
abilities.effect: Allied Units do not lose their hunker when they become Engaged and can gain and have hunker while they are engaged. While an allied Galactic Republic Unit has one or more hunker, it adds 1 die to its defense rolls against melee attacks. After an attack targeting a character in an allied Galactic Republic Unit is resolved, that character's Unit may remove all its hunker. If it does, one character in that Unit may heal for each hunker removed. Then each character that healed may dash.

abilities.name: We've Got a Big Problem....
abilities.effect: At the start of this Unit's activation, choose an enemy character within range 5 that is contesting an Active objective. The chosen character gains exposed.

abilities.name: Defensive Maneuver
abilities.effect: Each character in this Unit may dash. If any characters dash, this Unit gains hunker.

abilities.name: Say Goodnight, Clanker!
abilities.effect: Characters in this Unit have Sharpshooter[2]. When a character in this Unit makes a ranged attack, the target does not benefit from Cover.

abilities.name: Bring It Down!
abilities.effect: When an allied Clone Trooper Supporting character within range 4 that has one or more hunker makes a ranged attack as part of a combat action, it may reroll up to two of its failure results.

abilities.name: Defensive Maneuver
abilities.effect: Each character in this Unit may dash. If any characters dash, this Unit gains hunker.

abilities.name: Coordinated Fire: Pinned
abilities.effect: When a character in another allied Galactic Republic Unit makes an attack as part of a combat action, before dice are rolled, this Unit may use this ability. If the targeted character is within range 5 of a character in this Unit, the target Unit gains pinned.

abilities.name: Brothers in Arms
abilities.effect: While this Unit has one or more hunker. characters in this Unit have Steadfast.

abilities.name: Full Recovery
abilities.effect: Choose an allied Unit within range 3. The chosen Unit removes all damage and conditions from itself.

abilities.name: Sprint
abilities.effect: Each character in this Unit may dash.

abilities.name: Precise Strike
abilities.effect: After this Unit makes a combat action, it may use this ability. Choose an allied Galactic Republic Supporting Unit within range 3 of a character in this Unit. If the chosen Unit's Order Card is in the Order Deck, each character in that Unit may dash. If the chosen Unit's Order Card is not in the Order Deck, one character in the chosen Unit may make a 5 dice attack.

abilities.name: Flow of the Force
abilities.effect: Once per turn, when an enemy Unit becomes Wounded, after the effect is resolved, one allied character may dash. When an enemy character Wounds an allied Unit, after the effect is resolved, a character in another allied Unit may heal 3. You may look at the top card of your Order Deck before revealing an Order Card or choosing to activate a Unit from reserve.

abilities.name: Force Push
abilities.effect: Choose a character in this Unit and an enemy character within range 3 of that character. Push the chosen enemy character range 3 Away from the chosen allied character.

abilities.name: Force Speed
abilities.effect: Each character in this Unit may advance.

abilities.name: Slip Away
abilities.effect: When another allied Galactic Republic character targets an enemy character that is Engaged with one or more characters in this Unit with an attack, this Unit may use this ability. One character in this Unit that is Engaged with the target character may immediately reposition. If it does, this Unit gains hunker.

abilities.name: Faithful Padawan
abilities.effect: While an enemy character is Engaged with a character in this Unit and a character in an allied Jedi Primary Unit, characters in this Unit and characters in that allied Jedi Primary Unit add 2 dice to melee attack rolls targeting that enemy character. After this Unit makes a recover action, each other allied Unit within range 3 may remove 1 damage or one condition from itself.

abilities.name: Defensive Maneuver
abilities.effect: Each character in this Unit may dash. If any characters dash, this Unit gains hunker.

abilities.name: Coordinated Fire: Damage
abilities.effect: When a character in another allied Galactic Republic Unit makes an attack as part of a combat action, before dice are rolled, this Unit may use this ability. If the targeted character is within range 5 of a character in this Unit, the target Unit suffers 1 damage.

abilities.name: Ascension Cables
abilities.effect: Characters in this Unit have Scale.

abilities.name: Brothers in Arms
abilities.effect: While this Unit has one or more hunker, characters in this Unit have Steadfast.

abilities.name: Commando Armor
abilities.effect: Characters in this Unit have Protection.

abilities.name: Rush to Action
abilities.effect: At the start of this Unit's Activation, choose another allied Galactic Republic Unit. Each character in this Unit and each character in the chose Unit may dash.

abilities.name: Tempered Aggression
abilities.effect: When a character in this Unit makes an attack, after all Attack Dice and Defense Dice have been rolled, this Unit may spend any number of Force to use this ability. Reroll one failure result in the attack roll for each Force spent.

abilities.name: Shatterpoint
abilities.effect: When this Unit is chosen to activate with a Shatterpoint Card, if its Active Stance is Form VII Vaapad, it immediately makes a focus action and characters in this Unit have Impact[2] until the end of the Turn. If its Active Stance is Jedi Master, refresh 2 Force and one character in this Unit may heal 3.

abilities.name: This Party's Over
abilities.effect: While a character in this Unit is Engaged, allied Galactiv Republic characters within range 5 have Steadfast and Protection.

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.effect: At the start of this Unit's activation, choose another allied Galactic Republic character. The chosen character may dash.

abilities.name: Incoming
abilities.effect: Allied Clone Trooper Units within range 3 that have one or more hunker, have Immunity[Exposed].

abilities.name: Forward Scout
abilities.effect: When deploying a squad that includes this Unit, allied Clone Trooper Secondary characters and allied Clone Trooper Supporting characters may be placed within range 2 of the first placed character from that squad's Primary Unit, instead of the normal range 1.

abilities.name: Defensive Maneuver
abilities.effect: Each character in this Unit may dash. If any characters dash, this Unit gains hunker.

abilities.name: Coordinated Fire: Exposed
abilities.effect: When a character in another allied Galactic Republic Unit makes an attack as part of a combat action, before dice are rolled, this Unit may use this ability. If the targeted character is within range 5 of a character in this Unit, the target Unit gains Exposed.

abilities.name: Brothers in Arms
abilities.effect: While this Unit has one or more hunker, characters in this Unit have Steadfast.

abilities.name: Lay Low
abilities.effect: When a character in this Unit rolls defense dice during a Ranged attack, if this Unit has one or more hunker, add 1 Defense Expertise to the roll.

abilities.name: I Know If We Work Together, We Will Stay Alive
abilities.effect: At the start of this Unit's activation, choose an allied Galactic Republic Unit. Each character in the chosen Unit may dash. Then, if the chosen Unit was a Trooper or Padawan, one Character in this Unit may dash.

abilities.name: Force Push
abilities.effect: Choose a character in this Unit and an enemy character within range 3 of that character. Push the chosen enemy character range 3 Away from the chosen allied character.

abilities.name: Deflect
abilities.effect: After a Ranged attack targeting a character in this Unit is resolved, this Unit may use this ability. If the attack roll contained one or more failure results, the attacking Unit suffers 2 damage.

abilities.name: We Can Do This the Simple Way or the Difficult Way
abilities.effect: While this Unit is not Wounded, when another allied Galactic Republic character within range 3 is targeted by an attack, this Unit may gain Exposed. If it does, the defending character may use this unit's Defense Expertise Chart during the attack, instead of its own. Then, after the attack is resolved, if the defending character was a Trooper or Padawan, one character in this Unit may Dash toward the attacker.

abilities.name: Race Ya
abilities.effect: At the start of this Unit's activation, choose allied Galactic Republic Primary Unit or an allied Jedi Primary Unit. One character in the chosen Unit may dash.

abilities.name: She is Fearless
abilities.effect: Each character in this Unit may Jump. This Unit may use this ability two times during its activation instead of the normal one.

abilities.name: Deflect
abilities.effect: After a Ranged attack targeting a character in this Unit is resolved, it may use this ability. If the attack roll contained one or more Failure results, the attacking Unit suffers 2 damage.

abilities.name: Getting Ahead of Yourself Again, Snips
abilities.effect: After an allied Galactic Republic Supporting Unit within range 3 makes a combat action, this Unit may use this ability. One character in this unit may Jump, then make a 5 dice Melee attack targeting one of the same enemy characters within Range and LOS.

abilities.name: Flank 'Em!
abilities.effect: At the start of this Unit's activation, choose an allied Clone Trooper Unit. Each character in the chosen Unit may Climb.

abilities.name: Run and Gun
abilities.effect: Each character in this Unit may Dash. If any characters Dash, this Unit immediately makes a focus action.

abilities.name: Pack Hunter
abilities.effect: When a character in this Unit makes a Melee attack targeting an enemy character that is Engaged with another allied Clone Trooper character, it adds 2 dice to the attack roll.

abilities.name: Wolfpack
abilities.effect: While ths Unit is not Wounded, when and allied Clone Trooper character makes an attack targeting an enemy character within range 5 of a different allied Clone Trooper Unit, the attacker's Critical Success results cannot be modified by enemy effects.

abilities.name: Run and Gun
abilities.effect: Each character in this Unit may dash. If any characters dash, this Unit immediately makes a focus action.

abilities.name: Coordinated Fire: Strain
abilities.effect: When a character in another allied Galactic Republic Unit makes an attack as part of a combat action, before dice are rolled, this Unit may use this ability. If the targeted character is within range 5 of a character in this Unit, the target Unit gains Strain.

abilities.name: Pack Hunter
abilities.effect: When a character in this Unit makes a Melee attack targeting an enemy character that is Engaged with another allied Clone Trooper character, it adds 2 dice to the attack roll.

abilities.name: Royal Command
abilities.effect: Choose an allied Galactic Republic Unit. Each character in the chosen Unit may Advance.

abilities.name: Coordinated Fire: 2 Damage
abilities.effect: When a character in an allied Handmaiden Unit makes an attack as part of a combat action, before dice are rolled, this Unit may use this ability. If the targeted character is within range 5 of a character in this Unit, the target suffers 2 damage.

abilities.name: Crack Shot
abilities.effect: Characters in this Unit have Sharpshooter[2]. When this Unit makes a focus action, each character in this Unit may dash.

abilities.name: Servant of the People
abilities.effect: While this Unit is not Wounded and while one or more characters in this Unit are contesting an Active object, if this Unit's Active Stance is Faith in Diplomacy, allied Galactic Republic Supporting characters can contest the same Active objective, even while they are Wounded. While this Unit is not Wounded, if this Unit's Active Stance is Aggressive Negotiations, allied Galactic Republic Supporting characters within range 4 add 1 die to their attack rolls.

abilities.name: Loyal Protectors
abilities.effect: At the start of this Unit's activation, each allied Handmaiden character may dash toward an allied Primary character.

abilities.name: Expose Flank
abilities.effect: Each character in this unit may Climb. If any character ends this movement at a higher elevation than it began, charaters in this Unit have Sharpshooter[1] until the end of the Turn and this Unit immediately makes a focus action.

abilities.name: Coordinated Assault: Dash
abilities.effect: When a character in another allied Galactic Republic Unit makes an attack as part of a combat action, before dice are rolled, this Unit may use this ability. If the targeted character is within range 5 of a character in this Unit, one character in this Unit may dash.

abilities.name: Bodyguard
abilities.effect: Allied Primary characters within range 2 and allied Secondary characters within range 2 of a character in this Unit have Cover[1].

abilities.name: Expose Flank
abilities.effect: Each character in this unit may Climb. If any character ends this movement at a higher elevation than it began, charaters in this Unit have Sharpshooter[1] until the end of the Turn and this Unit immediately makes a focus action.

abilities.name: Coordinated Fire: Disarm
abilities.effect: When a character in another allied Galactic Republic Unit makes an attack as part of a combat action, before dice are rolled, this Unit may use this ability. If the targeted character is within range 5 of a character in this Unit, the target Unit gains Disarm.

abilities.name: Intercede
abilities.effect: While this Unit is not Wounded, enemy characters Engaged with one or more characters in this Unit cannot target allied Primary characters or allied Secondary characters with attacks.

abilities.name: Vader's Fury
abilities.effect: Each character in this Unit may Advance. During the next attack made by a character in this Unit during this activation, after all dice rolls have been modified, add 2 damage to the Damage Pool.

abilities.name: Riposte
abilities.effect: After a Melee attack targeting a character in this Unit is resolved, this Unit may use this ability. If the attack roll contained one or more failure results, the attacking Unit suffers 2 damage.

abilities.name: The Sith Lord Strikes Back
abilities.effect: When this Unit is Wounded by an attack, after the attack is resolved, it may use this ability. One character in this Unit may immediate dash and make a 5 dice Melee attack targeting the character that Wounded it.

abilities.name: Your Hatred Makes You Powerful
abilities.effect: When an allied character makes a Melee attack as part of a combat action, after choosing the target, the attacking Unit may suffer 2 damage. If it does,the attacker adds 3 dice to the attack roll.

abilities.name: Run
abilities.effect: At the start of this Unit's activation, choose a character in this Unit or another allied character that is Engaged with an enemy character. The chosen character may Heal and Reposition.

abilities.name: Mind Trick
abilities.effect: When an allied character within range 3 is targeted by an attack, this Unit may use this ability. The attack ends. If it is the attacker's activation, it make make another attack targeting a different charcter. If it does, remove 2 dice from the attack roll.

abilities.name: Greater Purpose
abilities.effect: This Unit has Immunity[Exposed]. When this Unit would gain Exposed, one character in this Unit may Heal instead.

abilities.name: Last Stand of the Jedi
abilities.effect: For each injured token this Unit has, characters in this Unit add 2 dice to their attack and defense rolls.

abilities.name: You Don't Know the Power of the Dark Side
abilities.effect: At the start of this Unit's activation it may remove 2 damage or one condition from itself, then refresh 1 Force.

abilities.name: Anger, Hate, Aggression
abilities.effect: One character in this Unit may dash. If it does, that character adds 3 dice to its next attack roll during this activation. If that attack roll contains one or more Failure results, this Unit gains Exposed after the attack is resolved.

abilities.name: You are Unwise to Lower Your Defenses
abilities.effect: When a character in this Unit is targeted by a Melee attack, this Unit may use this ability. After the attack is resolved, if the attack roll contained one or more Failure results, the attacking Unit suffers 3 damage.

abilities.name: Perhaps I Can Find New Ways to Motivate Them
abilities.effect: When a character in this unit Wounds an enemy Unit, after the effect is resolved, another allied Galactic Empire character may dash.

abilities.name: You Cannot Hide Forever
abilities.effect: At the end of this Unit's activation, if no character in this Unit Wounded an enemy Unit during that activation and if this Unit's Order Card is not in the Order Deck or in Reserve, shuffle its Order Card into your Order Deck.

abilities.name: Inexorable Advance
abilities.effect: At the start of this Unit's activation, you may choose an allied Galactic Empire Supporting Unit. Each character in the chosen Unit may Advance. Then, if any characters Advance, the chosen Unit suffers 1 damage.

abilities.name: Imperial Firepower
abilities.effect: Choose an enemy character within range 4 of two or more allied Galactic Empire characters. The chosen character gains Pinned or Disarm.

abilities.name: Coordinated Offensive
abilities.effect: When a character in this Unit or another allied Stormtrooper character makes an attack as part of a combat action, before dice are rolled, this Unit may use this ability. Add 1 die to the attack roll for each allied Stormtrooper Unit, other than the attacking Unit, that is within range 5 and LOS of the target.

abilities.name: Only Imperial Stormtroopers Are So Precise
abilities.effect: Characters in this Unit have Sharpshooter[1].

abilities.name: Assault Tactics
abilities.effect: Each character in this Unit may dash. Then this Unit may suffer damage to immediately perform a focus action.

abilities.name: For the Empire!
abilities.effect: Action: Choose an enemy character Engaged with one or more characters in this Unit and one of the allied characters it is Engaged with. Push the chosen enemy character range 2 away from the chosen allied character. Then this Unit gains Exposed.

abilities.name: Only Imperial Stormtroopers Are So Precise
abilities.effect: Characters in this Unit have Sharpshooter[1].

abilities.name: You Don't Know the Power of the Dark Side
abilities.effect: At the start of this Unit's activation it may remove 2 damage or one condition from itself, then refresh 1 Force.

abilities.name: Anger, Hate, Aggression
abilities.effect: One character in this Unit may dash. If it does, that character adds 3 dice to its next attack roll during this activation. If that attack roll contains one or more Failure results, this Unit gains Exposed after the attack is resolved.

abilities.name: You are Unwise to Lower Your Defenses
abilities.effect: When a character in this Unit is targeted by a Melee attack, this Unit may use this ability. After the attack is resolved, if the attack roll contained one or more Failure results, the attacking Unit suffers 3 damage.

abilities.name: Perhaps I Can Find New Ways to Motivate Them
abilities.effect: When a character in this unit Wounds an enemy Unit, after the effect is resolved, another allied Galactic Empire character may dash.

abilities.name: You Cannot Hide Forever
abilities.effect: At the end of this Unit's activation, if no character in this Unit Wounded an enemy Unit during that activation and if this Unit's Order Card is not in the Order Deck or in Reserve, shuffle its Order Card into your Order Deck.

abilities.name: Inexorable Advance
abilities.effect: At the start of this Unit's activation, you may choose an allied Galactic Empire Supporting Unit. Each character in the chosen Unit may Advance. Then, if any characters Advance, the chosen Unit suffers 1 damage.

abilities.name: Imperial Firepower
abilities.effect: Choose an enemy character within range 4 of two or more allied Galactic Empire characters. The chosen character gains Pinned or Disarm.

abilities.name: Coordinated Offensive
abilities.effect: When a character in this Unit or another allied Stormtrooper character makes an attack as part of a combat action, before dice are rolled, this Unit may use this ability. Add 1 die to the attack roll for each allied Stormtrooper Unit, other than the attacking Unit, that is within range 5 and LOS of the target.

abilities.name: Only Imperial Stormtroopers Are So Precise
abilities.effect: Characters in this Unit have Sharpshooter[1].

abilities.name: Assault Tactics
abilities.effect: Each character in this Unit may dash. Then this Unit may suffer damage to immediately perform a focus action.

abilities.name: For the Empire!
abilities.effect: Action: Choose an enemy character Engaged with one or more characters in this Unit and one of the allied characters it is Engaged with. Push the chosen enemy character range 2 away from the chosen allied character. Then this Unit gains Exposed.

abilities.name: Only Imperial Stormtroopers Are So Precise
abilities.effect: Characters in this Unit have Sharpshooter[1].
